title: A new day, a new Firefly
description:
Get ready for 0.4 (or, 0.4.0.1 to be exact)! This release has some interesting new features. Read more to find out, I’ve included a screen shot for your pleasure.
 Twitter integration Easier copying of short URLs Highlight the last shortened URL Several fixes, see HISTORY for details  Coming from Digg? Check out the source and README at http://github.com/ariejan/firefly
The 0.4.0.1 release fixes file permissions for the twitter.png image so your server can read it properly.
